linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Mac OS 10.7+
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7+
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 470 de 1 GB/AMD HD 7870 de 2 GB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 de 3 GB/AMD R9 290 de 4 GB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
